name: Madcow
description: Madcow descends from two high-energy sativas, Durban Poison and Purple Cow. With a heavy blanket of crystal resin, this strain is a solid choice for veteran consumers and for making concentrates. This pure-blooded sativa will hit you with weightless cerebral effects and induce fits of laughter. Smooth yet spicy, this flower releases a flavor similar to that of butterscotch.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Uplifted, Energetic, Relaxed, Talkative, Cramps, Depression, Eye Pressure, Fatigue, Stress, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious
